sobre1: Hi! I'm Tiago, an Information Systems student and technology enthusiast. I like to get my hands dirty, test ideas and create cool things with code. I've studied C, HTML, CSS, Java and I'm always learning more.
sobre2: I am a developer passionate about creating innovative solutions. I have experience in several technologies and I always seek to learn more.
sobre3: Additionally, I enjoy collaborating with other developers and participating in open source communities.
sobre4: You can see some of my projects on GitHub and contact me to discuss collaborations.
sobre5: This portfolio is a way to showcase what I've been building and learning. If you like something here, let's chat!
desc1: Brief description of project 1. Example text to test the layout.
